original_title: Portraits of Inspiring Lives with Bob Proctor
overview: For more than 40 years, Bob Proctor has focused his work and his teachings on helping people use the power of their minds to achieve lives of prosperity, rewarding relationships and spiritual awareness. But it wasn't always thus â€“ at age 26 he was unhappy, sick, broke, and headed in the wrong direction, until a man introduced him to a powerful book.
title: Portraits of Inspiring Lives with Bob Proctor
